dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informal and concerned discussion about a weather forecast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, I'm looking at this forecast from Kazhydromet, right? And it says gusts of 18 meters per second. Like, that's almost 65 kilometers an hour!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, I'm looking at this forecast from Kazhydromet, right? And it says gusts of eighteen meters per second. Like, that's almost sixty five kilometers an hour!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West wind 5-10, gusts of 18 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I saw that, uh, and I was just thinking, "Whoa."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I saw that, uh, and I was just thinking, Whoa.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa is right! Like, for Astana, it's snow, ground blizzards, icy roads... for three days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa is right! Like, for Astana, it's snow, ground blizzards, icy roads... for three days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: March 7: variable cloudiness, snow at times, ground blizzard, icy roads. ... March 8: variable cloudiness, occasional snow, ground blizzard, ice. ... March 9: variable cloudiness, snow at night and in the morning, ground blizzard.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And those night temperatures too, um, negative five to negative seven Celsius!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And those night temperatures too, um, negative five to negative seven Celsius!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: from -5 to -7ÂC at night, from 2 to 4ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but then it's like two to four degrees during the day, so it's all melting and refreezing. It's a mess!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but then it's like two to four degrees during the day, so it's all melting and refreezing. It's a mess!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: from -5 to -7ÂC at night, from 2 to 4ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! A total, uh, nightmare for drivers, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! A total, uh, nightmare for drivers, for sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then Almaty isn't even better, really, with the rain and snow, and then fog in the evening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Almaty isn't even better, really, with the rain and snow, and then fog in the evening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: March 7: variable cloudiness, precipitation during the day (rain, snow). Fog in the evening, icy roads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fog and icy roads? Uh, that's just a recipe for disaster.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fog and icy roads? Uh, that's just a recipe for disaster.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A total recipe! And they actually issued a warning for Almaty residents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A total recipe! And they actually issued a warning for Almaty residents.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kazhydromet issued a warning for Almaty residents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, they had to, right? With, uh, zero to negative two at night and then five to seven in the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, they had to, right? With, uh, zero to negative two at night and then five to seven in the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: from 0 to -2ÂC at night, from 5 to 7ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's just constant, like, freeze, thaw, freeze, thaw for days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's just constant, like, freeze, thaw, freeze, thaw for days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: From March 7th to the 9th, too. Not just, like, one day of bad weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From March seventh to the ninth, too. Not just, like, one day of bad weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has announced the weather forecast for Astana and Almaty for the next three days, from March 7 to 9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, it's a whole, like, three-day weather event. Just, like, a really complicated one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, it's a whole, like, three-day weather event. Just, like, a really complicated one.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Variable cloudiness, but consistently terrible conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Variable cloudiness, but consistently terrible conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: March 7: variable cloudiness, snow at times, ground blizzard, icy roads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Consistently terrible, uh, with strong winds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Consistently terrible, uh, with strong winds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southwest, west wind 9-14, gusts of 15-18 m/s at night.
